snippet.title: Forgotlings Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist now/Check out more: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2059570/Forgotlings/

Forgotlings is a breathtaking cinematic action-adventure game set in an enchanted realm inhabited by lost things searching for a purpose. Journey to distant corners of our collective memories and unite warring tribes against a mysterious looming threat to their existence.
A wholly original storyworld filled with wonder and imagination awaits your discovery.

Support us now on Kickstarter!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/650985621/forgotlings?ref=22f4sy&token=2c15c356

Developed by Throughline Games.
http:throughlinegames.com
www.forgotlings.com
